copy.headline: Minibits

microcopy.text: Minibits is a Bitcoin Lightning and ecash wallet that enables instant, low-cost, and private value transfers.
Ecash is issued by mints and backed by Bitcoin via the Cashu protocol and the Lightning Network.
Minibits wallet also provides you with a free Lightning address, and with Nostr Wallet Connect built in, it's perfect for sending small tips—known as "zaps"—on Nostr social networks.
Minibits is available in open beta testing on Google Play and on iOS App Store!

trustSignals: Open beta availability on established app stores
